name: GOOGLE MATERIAL SEARCH SIMPLIFIED [2021 REVAMP]
description:
This is remodified version of vaaski's GOOGLE MATERIAL SEARCH SIMPLIFIED, updated to support the latest Google search webpage (as of 02/16/21).

ORIGINAL DESCRIPTION:

This is as clean as it gets.
Simple and animated.
Updated whenever I want to improve stuff.
additional_info:
v1.3:
-Remodified by NeonHD
   - Updated code to support current Google webpage, which recently broke the userstyle
   - Revamped the animations a bit

v1.2:
-Fixed font when not installed
-Added ability to use the default font(s)
-Added comments to help understanding the code

v1:
-Initial release
